turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good afternoon. I was hoping to place a pickup order for Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a venti iced pumpkin spice latte, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti iced pumpkin spiced latte with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I go ahead and get pickup at the 815 25th Avenue South location in Minneapolis?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 815 25th ave south.
